product_name: Bronze Plaque - Dark Brown - Lugs with Studs
ml_tags: The Woodrow Nash Studios & Gallery was opened in Akron, Ohio in August 2002 with the purpose to  nurture and promote a sense of cultural awareness. The studio/gallery which resonates as a labor of love was established by Woodrow Nash internationally renowned artist. Nash has a passion to elevate the human spirit through art. The gallery represents over 30 years of a journey of discovery, cultural, social and spiritual experiences transformed into statues, busts, torsos and timeless objects of sacred art, Woodrow Nash’s gallery houses one of the most recognized collections of ceramic tribal art in the world.  The majestic sculptures present a merging of 15th Century Benin and 18th Century French Nouveau, creating what he has coined as “African Nouveau”. Through his body of art, Nash works to achieve a goal of Integrating expression, complex symbolism and sophisticated aesthetics to embody  the human soul. woodrownashstudios.com Woodrow Nash
